answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestion. We would like to add a diabetes or blood glucose tracker in the near future. Please see our post about upcoming trackers:http://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/603286Thanks,MedHelp

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: I JUST RECENTLY DISCOVERED YOUR TRACKERS.  IT IS THE BEST THING FOR US IN A LONG TIME.  I SUGGESTED TO ADD A BLOOD SUGAR TRACKER YESTERDAY.  TODAY I AM SUGGESTING A FEATURE TO HELP ACUTE DIABETICS.  THE TRACKER SHOULD HAVE PRESET SAMPLE TIMES AT: (1) BEFORE 1st MEAL (2) AFTER 1st MEAL (3) MID MORNING (4) BEFORE NOON MEAL (5) AFTER NOON MEAL (6) MID AFTERNOON(7) BEFORE LAST MEAL (8) AFTER LAST MEAL (9)  AT BEDTIME.  THIS MAY SEEM TO BE A LOT OF FINGER STICKS AND TESTS, BUT AT THE START OF TREATMENT OR AT CRITICAL PERIODS THIS VERY USEFULL TO MAINTAIN PROPER CONTROL.  CALL OR WRITE IF NEEDED, 9367564176 0R ***@****.  mgrampy.
title: BLOOD SUGAR TRACKER
